author: srifqi
long_description:
This mod will ban player based on its username, not its IP address. You can also add some username manually in `bannedplayerlist.txt`.

**Usage**

* Check ban for a player: `/abancheck <player name>`
* Simple ban/unban: `/aban <player name>` and `/unaban <player name>`
* Ban with kick: `/abankick <player name>`
* Ban with IP: `/aban+ <player name>` and `/unaban+ <player name>`
name: advancedban
short_description: Advanced Ban: Ban a player based on its username
title: Advanced Ban
